name: Jetcar Dragstrip!
description:
This is my first game built using the Unity engine. It was my project in their "Junior Programmer" pathway. I'm a full time developer, but only took up game development last year as a distraction from not being able to do much else in Covid lockdowns! It has been a steep learning curve building this game, but a lot of fun.

The aim of the game is to clock the fastest time you can at the speed trap, but then come to a controlled halt without crashing in a dreadful way.

I'd love to know your fastest times so comment here!
